Package me.julb.applications.authorizationserver.services.impl

Class UserSessionServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
me.julb.applications.authorizationserver.services.impl.UserSessionServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserSessionService
@Service @Validated @Transactional(readOnly=true, propagation=SUPPORTS) public class UserSessionServiceImpl extends Object implements UserSessionService
The user session service implementation.
